mapper.insert: INSERT INTO person_info( sabun, password, user_nm, birth_num, email, phonenum, user_position, team_nm ) VALUES( #{sabun}, #{password}, #{user_nm}, #{birth_num}, #{email}, #{phonenum}, #{user_position}, #{team_nm} );
mapper.select: select SABUN ,USER_NM ,cc.DC as USER_POSITION , TEAM_NM , PHONENUM from person_info pi join common_code cc ON pi.USER_POSITION = cc.CODE where DEL_YN = 'N' order by cc.CODE desc
select SABUN ,PASSWORD ,USER_NM ,BIRTH_NUM ,PHONENUM ,USER_POSITION ,TEAM_NM ,EMAIL from person_info where SABUN = #{userSabun}

select SABUN, USER_NM , cc.DC as position, TEAM_NM , PHONENUM from person_info pi left outer join common_code cc on pi.USER_POSITION = cc.CODE order by pi.USER_POSITION desc limit #{pageStart}, #{perPageNum}

select SABUN, USER_NM , cc.DC as position, TEAM_NM , PHONENUM from person_info pi left outer join common_code cc on pi.USER_POSITION = cc.CODE where pi.USER_NM like concat('%', #{user_nm}, '%') order by pi.USER_POSITION desc limit #{pageStart}, #{perPageNum}
